alert.note: Alert for Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:37PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oxford County through 315 PM EDT... At 236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Bethel, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bethel, Turner, Rumford, Jay, Dixfield, Canton, Mexico, Livermore, Buckfield, Hartford, Greenwood, West Paris, Woodstock, Sumner, Milton, Peru, Albany, Paris and Norway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
